title: Blah decorative t shirt
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134033im_/http:/typophile.com/files/organic_mens_fitted_tshirt_dark_4294.jpg)

Used by Geddy Lee (Rush band bassist).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134033im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thanks_4115.png)

Many thanks for your help fvilanakis.  
Cheers!

Font: 

 GardeniaVictorian 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134033/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: srayala

comments.content:
This is included in Dan Solo's "Victorian Display Alphabets" (Dover Press) as **GardeniaVictorian**  
There is also a digital version named **[Holtzschue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134033/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Holtzschue%20-%20Regular&fid=718f79b4b32b41a3caacbcc3e1eea927&fsize=60&text=BLAH&fit=1)** by D. Rakowski (1992)
